title: Avant Garde original cut
content:
I guess this is a pretty easy one. I am looking for that original cut of Avant Garde, where the A, V, M are tilted to the right.

Any suggestions? It could be a revision of it too.

Thanks!
author: fersch

comments.content:
I think what you might be looking for can be found here ...

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner\_flake/avant\_garde\_gothic\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090520015404/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/avant_garde_gothic_alternate/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner\_flake/avant\_garde\_gothic\_alternate/")
